abstract: Novelis, a unit of the Indian aluminum maker Hindalco Industries, is in talks to buy BP out of its 60 percent stake in their United States joint venture for $600 million, Mint reported.
snippet: Novelis, a unit of the Indian aluminum maker Hindalco Industries, is in talks to buy BP out of its 60 percent stake in their United States joint venture for $600 million, Mint reported.
lead_paragraph: Novelis, a unit of the Indian aluminum maker Hindalco Industries, is in talks to buy BP out of its 60 percent stake in their United States joint venture, Logan Aluminum, for $600 million, the business newspaper Mint reported on Thursday.

headline.main: Novelis Seeks to Buy BP Stake in Venture
